show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #18 Jeff Ramseyer Organic Valley Dairy Co-Op
subtitle: #18 Jeff Ramseyer Organic Valley Dairy Co-Op
summary:
This week Jeff joins us to talk about the Dairy industry and kick off a dairy mini series.

The https://www.organicvalley.coop/ Website is full of great information
